bugs_fixed_list.description: Dark mode tenant CSS vars overridden by app.css â€” specificity issue
bugs_fixed_list.fix: Changed dark mode selector to html[data-theme="dark"] for higher specificity

bugs_fixed_list.description: Tenant theme injected on cook dashboard routes, violating BR-084
bugs_fixed_list.fix: Added isDashboardRoute check to skip theme injection for /dashboard/*

observations: [ARCH] InjectTenantTheme currently path-matches in middleware; better approach would be applying only to tenant-public route group.
